chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the following issue:
My phone does not detect my SIM card, it shows a SIM card unavailable screen, but my SIM card is detected on my other phones.
Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days, they can proceed with your refund (if you're eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer confirms that:
✔ The product has not been repaired by someone else, and it has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ They have confirmed that all personal data has been erased.
✔ They have confirmed having the return label.
✔ They understand they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ They have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days, they can proceed with your refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair, the 29/05/2024. 
The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 
Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 03/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,

Koami-Abraham from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The phone seems to be locked, could you kindly ask the customer for the code? Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

I've checked, and the iCloud is off. 

According to the new rules of our policy, the customer is no longer able to provide any unlock code due to GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) reasons.
Therefore, we kindly ask you to click on this link https://support.apple.com/fr-fr/HT201263 and follow the tutorial initiated by Apple to reset the device.

Please remember that you have a deadline since you received the parcel.

Regards,

Koami-Abraham from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
